title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: Creed Offshoot Delphi, From EP Michael B. Jordan, Ordered to Series at Prime Video
description: The world of Creed is expanding with a new series on Prime Video, the streamer announced during its Upfront presentation Monday. Titled Delphi, the show will follow the careers of several young fighters at Delphi Boxing Academy, the gym where Michael B. Jordan’s titular boxer trained in the Creed film franchise. Starring Jordan as Adonis […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Spider-Noir: Nicolas Cage Suits Up in Superhero Series for MGM+ and Prime Video — WATCH
description: Academy Award winner Nicolas Cage aims to draw you into his web in the first photo and a teaser video, seen below, from Spider-Noir, a live-action series based on the Marvel comic Spider-Man Noir. Debuting Stateside on MGM+’s linear channel and then streaming globally on Prime Video, Spider-Noir tells the story of an aging and […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Carissa’s Corner: Broadcast TV Is Changing — So Are We
description: Broadcast TV is dumping scripted shows. We're evolving to survive — and we want you with us. Carissa’s Corner is back to speak directly to readers. The post Carissa’s Corner: Broadcast TV Is Changing — So Are We appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Carissa Pavlica

title: Here’s How Michael Strahan May Have Sniped Big Interview Amid Ratings War
description: Michael Strahan may have made a bold move to help Good Morning America by sniping a significant interview from their competitors. The post Here’s How Michael Strahan May Have Sniped Big Interview Amid Ratings War appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Matt Couden
